name: wiki_page_created
definition: The event is emitted anytime a new wiki page is created by an end user or API request.
trigger: Triggered when a new wiki page is created.

schema.body: The body of the new page. NOTE: This field will be truncated to only include the first 8192 characters.
schema.title: The title of the new page. NOTE: This field will be truncated to only include the first 8192 characters.
schema.wiki_page_id: The Canvas id of the new wiki page.
